title: 115_hr872
content: The Act may be cited as the "Disclosure; and Encouragement of Verification, Innovation, Cleaning, and Efficiency Act of 2017" or the "DEVICE Act of 2017". Reporting requirement for design and reprocessing instruction changes is mandated. SEC. 2. Reporting requirement for device design changes includes notifying the FDA before making any changes to a device's design or reprocessing instructions marketed in interstate commerce. The Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act is amended to include a reporting requirement for device manufacturers regarding communications to foreign health care providers. Manufacturers must notify the FDA within 5 days of making such communications. The Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act is amended to include a reporting requirement for device manufacturers regarding communications to foreign health care providers. Manufacturers must notify the FDA within 5 days of making such communications, which include changes to device design, reprocessing protocols, or safety concerns, and are widely disseminated to health care providers in foreign countries. An affiliate is defined as a business entity with a relationship to another entity. The amendment to the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act requires device manufacturers to report communications to foreign health care providers within 5 days if a business entity controls both entities directly or indirectly. SEC. 4. RAPID ASSESSMENT TESTS FOR PROPER REPROCESSING. The amendment includes a rapid assessment test for proper reprocessing of reusable devices, defining them as devices intended for multiple uses that must be sanitized to ensure safety and effectiveness. The amendment requires the development of a list of rapid assessment tests for reusable devices, with validated instructions for use and validation data. The Secretary will periodically update a list of rapid assessment tests for reusable devices and will not accept notifications for clearance of tests on the list without proper instructions and validation data.
